attributes.action: make cyclist pay tax and insurance to use the roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all adult cyclists should have a badge visible on their bikes to show that they have paid a road levvy and are insured. The badge should run from the 1st of January to 31st of December each year and be colour coded.  They can then be reported for riding on pavements going through red traffic lights and have third party insurance to cover injuries that they cause

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nocycletax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
